contentScriptErrorReason.message: For technical reasons, while bookmarks of Mozilla/Firefox domains and about: pages can be made, they cannot be saved while on those pages.

contentScriptErrorAdvice.message: Simply go to a tab of any other sort, and reattempt saving this bookmark. We apologise for the inconvenience.

sanityFieldsReason.message: Property fields contains properties that override others

networkErrorAdvice.message: Ensure that the server is running, and you have a working connection.

permissionErrorAdvice.message: Ensure your credentials confer write permissions.

ensureTiddlyWikiAdvice.message: Ensure that the configured address points to a TiddlyWiki server.

serverAddressAuthAdvice.message: Move authentication to its respective fields.

safetyErrorReason.message: Refusing to send plaintext to non-localhost address

unfinishedWarning.message: If you meant to discard this bookmark, hit Cancel.

optionsFirstInstall.message: This appears to be your first install. Be sure to review these settings and set the configuration that best suits how you use your TiddlyWiki.

quickmodeDesc.message: Disable the popup for one-click bookmarking. In the event of an error, click again to see a minimal popup describing what went wrong.

carefulDesc.message: When clicking out of the popup instead of hitting Cancel, consider the bookmark unfinished.

show_textDesc.message: Take notes on the bookmark directly in the popup window.

show_tagsDesc.message: Initially populated with the contents of Default Tags below.

default_tagsDesc.message: Specified in the TiddlyWiki format, i.e. separated by spaces; entries containing spaces enclosed in [[double square brackets]].

reqfavDesc.message: As there is no sensible way to access Firefox's favicon cache, favicons must be re-requested. If this raises privacy concerns, or you simply don't want to bloat your TW with excessive binary data, uncheck this.

savingmode_downloadDesc.message: Downloads a bookmark tiddler (or bookmark + favicon array) which may be imported by dragging into any TiddlyWiki.

savingmode_webserverDesc.message: Directly adds the appropriate tiddlers to a Node.js TiddlyWiki.

saveboxDesc.message: If you wish to adjust the filename before saving.

addressDesc.message: Should include protocol and port; i.e. http://localhost:8080

safetyDesc.message: By default, this add-on will complain if you attempt to authenticate or upload over cleartext to a Node.js TiddlyWiki that is not on localhost. If your TiddlyWiki lives on another box on the LAN, or you really don't care, you can turn this off.

bookmark_fmt_tagsDesc.message: Any tags in Default Tags, or those specified in the popup.

bookmark_fmt_textDesc.message: Any description provided in the popup.

bookmark_fmt_titleDesc.message:
By default or in Quick Mode, rawtitle scrubbed of any | [ ] { };
otherwise, the title entered into the popup

bookmark_fmt_iconDesc.message: Output of icon_fmt below; undefined if Use Favicons is unchecked or there is no favicon found

bookmark_fmtExplanation.message: Be sure to follow the TiddlyWeb JSON tiddler format rather than the standard. In the case of the Download or Tab-Over modes, the generated tiddler(s) will automatically be converted to the standard format; it's just more straightforward to go this way around than the other.

bookmark_fmtSanityWarning.message: In the Webserver saving mode, the returned JSON from this function will have its .title taken and URL encoded for the server API route. Lack of a title will cause an error in any mode; consider this your only sanity check.

favicon_separateDesc.message: When checked, the output of icon_fmt is presumed to be a full-fledged tiddler that is also downloaded or sent. When unchecked, the output of icon_fmt is only used as the icon parameter of bookmark_fmt.

favicon_fmt_dataDesc.message: Image data as a string, base64, or plaintext in the case of SVG; note how binary tiddlers are represented renders this distinction meaningless

favicon_fmt_hashDesc.message: SHA-1 sum of the binary representation of data; suggested as favicon tiddler title

favicon_fmt_datauriDesc.message: Full data URI constructed from data and mime

favicon_fmtExplanation.message: When using Separate Favicon, notes about .title apply as above.

textarea_tabsDesc.message: Textareas being bookmark_fmt and icon_fmt above. For accessibility reasons, it's best that this is on a manual switch.

unlock_resetWarning.message: Irreversible. Check the box to indicate that you are mindful of what you are doing.
